items.details:
Reading

Complete pages 92 - 93 in the My View book.

ReadWorks Assignment 4 – Fables

I have assigned 7 fables for you to complete in ReadWorks. Please work on them over the next two weeks.

 Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it
Take your time, do your best reading, and enjoy the stories.

PLEASE TRY YOUR BEST TO LOG IN AND GIVE AN ANSWER. PLEASE DO NOT WRITE KOREAN OR WRITE ‘I DON’T KNOW’

This week's story video is
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cccG9bMOfiY

Please watch the video until you fully understand

The spelling words for next week are:

preparations
magnificent 
brooded
rejoicing
satisfied
gigantic
flood
weary
darkness
politely
chest
spilled
scold
sighed
sparkling

Math

Complete Additional Practice 2-5
Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Science

Read and complete 16-21 in the science book - Patterns in Motion. (DUE Friday)

If you are not sure what trapeze means, please watch the video.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ae5WN1RYxnM 

The video will help also!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ePpWrvOXGY

Social Studies

We need to read and complete pages 14 -17. Read the information and ensure that all questions on each page are completed. (DUE MONDAY)

ReadWorks Assignment 5 – Tropical Rainforests

I have assigned a story about the rainforests on ReadWorks. Please complete it this week.

 Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it
Take your time, do your best reading, and enjoy the stories.

Spanish 

Next week there will be a test in Spanish. Please learn the numbers 1-30.
